title: Mastery lvl 7 token didn't drop?
body: So, I just got an S- as Sona and I have Mastery 6 with her, I was kinda wondering why a Mastery 7 token didn't drop just now. Is it because it's been too soon since I got the last one? I'm really confused...

replies.body:
Er. You got an S- and not an S or S+? 

That *shouldn't* give a mastery 7 token, as those require S or S+'s. 

Broporo there might be seeing an S game from a few days ago, which you probably did get your token for, but you wouldn't get a mastery 7 token for a S- game.

This is a very good point. AReallyBadSpy *has* had two matches recently with S's where he did get the two tokens, but the other matches are S-'s which you're correct about, they will not give mastery 7 tokens. This might be where the confusion is!
Thank you for trying, this is my first time trying to go for Mastery 7 on a champion, first Mastery 6 in fact, I'll keep this in mind
No worries bud, I'm here to help ^_^
Oh, ok, thanks, that makes sense

Glad you got that figured out!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I saw your last S with Sona was 11/1, and I did check and that 2nd mastery 7 token has been added already. If you still don't see it, try refreshing your client really quick and let me know if you see it then.
Could you shoot me a quick screenshot of your loot? Make sure you fully log out of the client and reopen it so your loot has a chance to refresh first.
